task.title: Getting the Size of a Large File using TEntry
task.shortdesc: Describes how to get the size of a large file through the directory entry class.

context.p: TEntry::FileSize() returns a 64-bit file size. TEntry::FileSize() replaces the function TEntry::iSize() as iSize() cannot represent a file size beyond 2GB-1 (if treated as a signed int) or beyond 4GB-1 (if treated as an unsigned int).
Replace calls to TEntry::iSize() with TEntry::FileSize() for large files.

step.cmd: Use TEntry::FileSize() instead of TEntry::iSize() for large files and replace the return variable of type TInt with a TInt64.
